meanings.definition: A person or thing that schedules.
meanings.sent1: The schedulers at the office create our daily timetables.
meanings.sent2: The school's schedulers arranged the classes for the semester.
meanings.sent3: The busy schedulers in the kitchen made sure the meals were served on time.
meanings.sent4: The schedulers of the train system keep everything running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The schedulers for the event meticulously planned every detail to perfection.

meanings.definition: A software program or system that organizes and plans tasks or events.
meanings.sent1: I rely on schedulers to remind me of important meetings.
meanings.sent2: The company uses schedulers to manage their project timelines.
meanings.sent3: The quirky schedulers on my phone always keep me on track.
meanings.sent4: The schedulers on the computer work tirelessly to keep everything in order.
meanings.sent5: The advanced schedulers in the software streamline our workflow efficiently.
